underlying_goal: Fix the bug report button not appearing in production by ensuring the correct environment variables are passed through the Docker build process
friction_detail: Initial deployment didn't fix the issue because Claude didn't check whether the GitHub Actions workflow was actually passing the bug report build args to Docker before triggering the first deploy.
brief_summary: User needed the bug report button to appear in production; Claude diagnosed that the GitHub Actions workflow was missing Docker build args for the bug report env vars, fixed the workflow, and successfully redeployed.
